name: Looper
description:
A Figma plugin for creating trippy generated graphics. Works with any Vector, Shape or Text layer.

Usage

1. Select a layer to multiply
2. Set the iteration count
3. Set the incremental changes for
- position and rotation
- scaling change
- opacity
- fill color
- stroke width and color
4. Magic

Example

https://twitter.com/kkuldar/status/1173364146114564101

Open source

https://github.com/kuldar/figma-looper
